category: Member city/provincial sports association regulations/Article 4-2 (Beneficiaries of provided benefits)
contents: Article 4-2 (Beneficiaries of provided benefits) ① The city/provincial sports association shall provide benefits provided to the beneficiaries through the performance of the purpose business free of charge. However, part of the cost may be borne by the beneficiary. ② Beneficiaries of the benefits provided through the performance of the city/provincial sports association's purpose business shall not be discriminated against based on place of birth, school, place of employment, occupation, religion, or other social status. [This article added on October 6, 2021]
